node_1: two men carrying a large bag
edge: Edward later sees two men carrying a large bag that appears to be dripping blood.
When Edward questions Willow about the grave, she reveals that Rowan is their daughter together.
Edward asks how Rowan died and Sister Rose tells him, "She'll burn to death."
Sister Summersisle thanks Rowan for her help, and Edward realizes that the search for Rowan was a setup the whole time.
